scripts.reinstall: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf pnpm-lock.yaml && rm -rf apps/web-react-router/node_modules && rm -rf apps/my-expo-app/node_modules && pnpm install
scripts.fastapi-dev: uv sync -p python3.11 && source .venv/bin/activate && set -a && source .env && set +a && python api/index.py
scripts.eas-build-local: cd apps/my-expo-app && eas build --profile local --local --platform ios
scripts.eas-build-dev: cd apps/my-expo-app && eas build --profile development --platform ios --non-interactive
scripts.eas-build-prod: cd apps/my-expo-app && eas build --profile production --platform ios
